mapper.select: select k.kincode, k.kinname,v.carcode,v.carname, m.memname,v.carnum,v.carpay,o.oilname,vtl.vtlname,f.faname,f.fayear from kindergarten k join teacher t on k.kincode=t.kincode join member m on m.memid=t.memid join vehicle v on v.tecode=t.tecode join vehiceltype vt on vt.vtcode=v.vtcode join factory f on vt.facode=f.facode join oil o on o.oilcode=vt.oilcode join vehicletypelist vtl on vtl.vtlcode=vt.vtlcode where k.kincode=#{kincode};
select k.kincode,t.tecode,m.memname from member m join teacher t on m.memid=t.memid join kindergarten k on t.kincode=k.kincode where k.kincode=#{kincode};

select k.kincode, k.kinname,v.carname, sv.svtime, m.memname, s.stname, c.cname, c.ccode from vehicle v join kindergarten k on v.kincode=k.kincode join teacher t on t.tecode=v.tecode join member m on m.memid=t.memid join schedule sd on sd.carcode=v.carcode join service sv on sv.svcode=sd.svcode join station s on s.sdcode=sd.sdcode join children c on c.stcode=s.stcode where k.kincode=#{kincode} order by carname desc;
mapper.delete: update children set stcode=null where ccode=#{ccode};
mapper.select: select k.kincode, k.kinname,v.carcode,v.carname, m.memname, m.memid from kindergarten k join teacher t on k.kincode=t.kincode join member m on m.memid=t.memid join vehicle v on v.tecode=t.tecode where k.kincode=#{kincode};

select k.kincode, k.kinname,c.ccode, c.cage,c.cname,c.cgen from member m join guardian g on m.memid=g.memid join children c on c.gcode=g.gcode join kindergarten k on c.kincode=k.kincode where k.kincode=#{kincode};

select k.kincode, k.kinname,st.stcode,st.stname from vehicle v join schedule sd on v.carcode=sd.carcode join kindergarten k on k.kincode=v.kincode join service sv on sv.svcode=sd.svcode join station st on st.sdcode=sd.sdcode where k.kincode=#{kincode};

select k.kincode, k.kinname,st.stcode,st.stname, st.stx,st.sty from vehicle v join schedule sd on v.carcode=sd.carcode join kindergarten k on k.kincode=v.kincode join service sv on sv.svcode=sd.svcode join station st on st.sdcode=sd.sdcode where k.kincode=#{kincode};
mapper.update: update station set sdcode=#{sdcode} where stcode=#{stcode};
update station set stname=#{stname} where stcode=#{stcode};
update station set stx=#{stx} where stcode=#{stcode};
update station set sty=#{sty} where stcode=#{stcode};
